docs.abstract: In iOS 11, you can make a video of what’s happening directly on your phone at the moment — without having to install an extra app.
docs.snippet: In iOS 11, you can make a video of what’s happening directly on your phone at the moment — without having to install an extra app.
docs.lead_paragraph: Q. I know it’s possible to take a still photo of what is on the iPhone 7 screen, but is it possible to record a video of what you are doing?

headline.main: How to Record Your iPhone Screen

docs.abstract: Delete old installation files and other unnecessary system detritus from your computer to free up hard-drive space.
docs.snippet: Delete old installation files and other unnecessary system detritus from your computer to free up hard-drive space.
docs.lead_paragraph: Q. I have an older computer and have been using Windows 7 for many years. As I update software, I have been accumulating installation files in the Downloads folder. Can I just clear the entire folder, or may some of them be filling some ongoing function?

headline.print_headline: When to Clear Out Old Downloads

docs.abstract: Google’s willingness to share its Android software and let others adapt it for their own use has lead to different versions of the system on different devices.
docs.snippet: Google’s willingness to share its Android software and let others adapt it for their own use has lead to different versions of the system on different devices.
docs.lead_paragraph: Q. Why are there so many different variations of Android compared to iOS? Which version is most common?

headline.main: Why Are There So Many Android Versions?

docs.abstract: You can get Microsoft Office on an annual subscription plan that keeps you up to date with new features or buy it outright with far fewer updates.
docs.snippet: You can get Microsoft Office on an annual subscription plan that keeps you up to date with new features or buy it outright with far fewer updates.
docs.lead_paragraph: Q. Microsoft keeps threatening to disable Word and Excel in a few days unless I pay $70 for the Office 365 yearly renewal. I don’t care about the latest features since not much has changed in the past year. How do I get around this and get rid of the pop-up box every time I open Word or Excel?

headline.main: Deciding to Rent or Buy Your Office
headline.print_headline: Deciding to Rent Or Buy Your Office

docs.abstract: If your Windows 10 lock screen changes daily or slows you down in getting to your desktop, you can change its behavior.
docs.snippet: If your Windows 10 lock screen changes daily or slows you down in getting to your desktop, you can change its behavior.
docs.lead_paragraph: Q. When I start my Windows 10 computer, there is a background picture I must click on before I can enter my password. The screen then defaults to a Bing page explaining all about the photo. How can I sign in directly to my desktop when I turn on the computer?

docs.abstract: Reports that the social network shared sensitive health and sexual data with outside companies set off a backlash.
docs.snippet: Reports that the social network shared sensitive health and sexual data with outside companies set off a backlash.
docs.lead_paragraph: Grindr, the social network aimed at gay, bisexual and transgender men, is facing a firestorm of criticism for sharing users’ H.I.V. status, sexual tastes and other intimate personal details with outside software vendors.

headline.main: Grindr Sets Off Privacy Firestorm After Sharing Users’ H.I.V.-Status Data

docs.abstract: A political data firm tied to the Trump campaign gained access to information on 50 million Facebook users. Here is how it happened, and the uproar it has caused.
docs.snippet: A political data firm tied to the Trump campaign gained access to information on 50 million Facebook users. Here is how it happened, and the uproar it has caused.
docs.lead_paragraph: Our report that a political firm hired by the Trump campaign acquired access to private data on millions of Facebook users has sparked new questions about how the social media giant protects user information.

headline.main: Facebook and Cambridge Analytica: What You Need to Know as Fallout Widens

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Russian Interference in 2016 US Elections and Ties to Trump Associates

docs.abstract: Google recently overhauled the web version of its email software, and you can try out the new version — even if you haven’t been formally invited yet.
docs.snippet: Google recently overhauled the web version of its email software, and you can try out the new version — even if you haven’t been formally invited yet.
docs.lead_paragraph: Q. I am curious about the new version of Gmail for the web, but it does not seem to have reached my account yet. When will it be available to everyone? If I don’t like it, is the upgrade mandatory?

docs.abstract: The law treats electronic books and their printed counterparts differently when it comes to what you can do with them.
docs.snippet: The law treats electronic books and their printed counterparts differently when it comes to what you can do with them.
docs.lead_paragraph: Q. Is it possible to donate e-books to a library’s digital collection?

docs.abstract: If you no longer wish to use Facebook’s message-sharing app on your smartphone, you can uninstall it.
docs.snippet: If you no longer wish to use Facebook’s message-sharing app on your smartphone, you can uninstall it.
docs.lead_paragraph: Q. How do I delete Facebook Messenger from my phone?
